name: GlassFox - change text color
description: Use this together with the theme GlassFox
additional_info:
with a wallpaper/background who is very bright the text on the tabs can be more visible if you change the default colors with this style.
Enable/disable the style to switch back and forward.

Intended to be used together with the theme GlassFox http://userstyles.org/styles/45089/glassfox-a-clean-theme

Try also GlassFox - dimmer on/off http://userstyles.org/styles/45654/glassfox-dimmer-on-off?r=1301129353
and GlassFox - stamped tabs http://userstyles.org/styles/46157/glassfox-stamped-tabs?r=1302031937
